title: Bits
description: The smallest units of sass code. Should only contain variables and utilities to be used by other files. They should not contain rule sets except those inside `mixins` or `placeholders`.

sections.title: Colours
sections.description: Defined colours are required for all browncoat libraries to compile correctly. All colours should be given a variable assignment to be used by all other files.

sections.title: Typography
sections.description: All text properties should be set as variables. Base size set at `62.5%` to reset font-size to `10px`. Global family should be set to the primary typeface for the site.

sections.title: Layout
sections.description: Set then number of columns and gutter here for the primary grid.

sections.title: Utilities
sections.description: Contains mixins, placeholders, and functions. See file for all utilities. Examples below are generic.

sections.title: Sprites
sections.description: Sprites stylesheet is automatically generated by gulp using `npm run gulp sprite`. This should not be manually changed as it is generated automatically. See `gulp` section for details on `gulp sprite` task.
